tags: Wait time,
review: ********* ************** ** ** **** ******* I booked an appointment for 5:30pm on Monday, August 22 because it was the earliest slot. Doctor arrived at 6:50. Despite having arrived on time, the doctor's assistant sends in another patient (with a later appointment) because "he looked around and couldn't see me." It's 7:15 by the time I finally get to see the doctor, who asks me to get some tests and come back on Wednesday evening. I arrive on Wednesday evening, wait for half an hour, having driven quite a bit in the rain, through traffic, when I finally decide to call his assistant, who tells me the doctor is on leave for the next two days. What sort of appointment management is this? This clinic is not even a real clinic, just a room rented out by a very crowded diagnostic centre. Pathetic experience from start to finish. The doctor is polite but what's the point of politeness if you don't respect your patients' time? I just decided to see another doctor.

Thanks to Practo, we reached to this amazing Doctor. He is detail oriented and listens patiently to what we have to discuss and share. He shows a great friendly gesture which encourages to discuss more about the problems and take proper feedback. Clinic: The facility is clean and they have all types of inhouse labs. In addition to Diabetes, they have other doctors, dieticians as well. They also have a tech based app which helps in diabetes management. I found it very useful and easy. Staff: Friendly staff and the guide properly on what to be done next.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I was struggling a lot due to my diabetes & busy schedule, due to which my health was affected a lot. One night I read on Practo about Onecare Clinic and its positive reviews. The next day, I immediately booked an appointment for myself. The most appreciative thing is that when I visited the clinic, the staff was very supportive & without wasting any time, I met the doctor at the exact time of my appointment. Dr. Basavaraj is quite understanding & with his expertise did make a difference in my health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Basavaraj always takes the time to make the patient feel at ease. Instead of just prescribing the medicine, he explains what it is for and why it is important. In case of any changes too, he explains why he is making the change and what we can expect out of it which helps in creating a lot more confidence in him. The best thing about him is that he works towards cure and prevention and not just management.
Also, the OneCare program that was suggested by him helped a lot in managing my diabetes as well as my lifestyle.
Doctor is very friendly and helps us understand the cause and treatment, super helpful too. I would highly recommend him.
Excellent treatment. Correct investigation and diagnosis. Happy to meet the doctor , he is so polite and listen to all our issues

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Basavaraj always takes the time to make the patient feel at ease. Instead of just prescribing the medicine, he explains what it is for and why it is important. In case of any changes too, he explains why he is making the change and what we can expect out of it which helps in creating a lot more confidence in him. The best thing about him is that he works towards cure and prevention and not just management.
Also, the OneCare program that was suggested by him helped a lot in managing my diabetes as well as my lifestyle.

I visited the OneCare diabetes clinic and was very happy on how the clinic staff helped with booking and directions. I am a type 2 chronic diabetic (having it for over 15 yrs) and have never been on insulin but here there was no other option but to take up insulin.

It was our first time knowing and understanding about insulin. And Dr. Basavaraj explained to the point about it and his encouragement to take up insulin without anyone's help really boosted my confidence.
I would have give 5 stars  because he did not deviate from topic he didn't go on a ranting spree on how Ayurveda is not so good

He stuck to what was important and he gave a good 30mins to us. Doctor has been very helpful. Provided optimum guidance, diet and exercise regime. Feeling very positive after talking to him.

Dr Basavaraj and OneCare team really cared for me. Dr spent ample time to understand the history, answered all my questions patiently and explained the complete treatment plan. That gave me lot of confidence and motivation on how I can really get control of my diabetes, rather than struggling with it. 

Subsequent consultation with Dietician and counselor was really good to help me understand the step by step plan on how my diabetes will be controlled through the program.  On joining the OneCare program I have already started seeing initial results in the first month with improvement in HBA1C levels. 

The best thing is that entire team is focused towards better outcomes  (not just doing consultations) and so, constantly support throughout reduction of diabetes.”

I am visiting doctor for my dad, he has so much patience to listen all the problems and also very calm person. No hurry , we can tell each and every problem we are facing . And my dad is felling great after consulting him . Highly recommended doctor. 
Thank you so much doctor.

I paid a fee of 750 taka to the doctor.  I already had thyroid report, showed the report, after seeing the report asked me to report some more and said that after reporting online medicine will tell me, I am told that I will be informed when told.  There is a lab center they have to do from the lab, **** **** ** **** * *** ** ***** ** ***** ****  I was first told that it would cost 2650 rupees to report, I said yes.  But when I get the report, I got a message that it will cost 4250 rupees.  This much money is not possible for me, ** **** ****** ** **** **** ** ******* **** ** **** **** ***** **** *******  I did not report from their lab, I was told that the medicine will be reported online, but I found that I was not informed any more.  Because maybe I didn't take the report from there.  Then the fee of 750 taka to see the doctor was wasted.
